newsArray.title: ‘India’s batting got exposed...’- Former Pakistani International Basit Khan takes a dig at the Indian batting collapse against New Zealand
creator: Soumyaroop Mukherjee
newsArray.description: New Delhi: India’s batting failure and consecutive low scores against New Zealand have earned the men in Blue criticism from all corners of the cricketing world. In what became the first defeat for India in 12 years at home, Rohit Sharma’s team has been torn apart by critics over lack of discipline in batting.The post ‘India’s batting got exposed...’- Former Pakistani International Basit Khan takes a dig at the Indian batting collapse against New Zealand appeared first on NewsroomPost.

newsArray.title: Kevin Pietersen question Gary Kirsten’s resignation as Pakistan head coach
creator: A Sports
newsArray.description: Former England batter Kevin Pietersen expressed his concerns regarding the premature resignation of Gary Kirsten as the white-ball head coach of Pakistan. Kirsten was appointed by the Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) in April 2024 for a two-year period. However, he has stepped down from the role after a meagre six months. The South African took [...]The post Kevin Pietersen question Gary Kirsten’s resignation as Pakistan head coach appeared first on ASports.tv.

creator: sanjay patil
newsArray.description: Test Cricket : न्यूझीलंडने टीम इंडियाला पुण्यात दुसर्‍या सामन्यात पराभूत करत पहिल्यांदा कसोटी मालिका जिंकली. टीम इंडियाला आतापर्यंत किती संघांनी मायदेशात कसोटी मालिकेत पराभूत केलंय? जाणून घ्या.

newsArray.title: IPL 2025 Retentions: कोलकाता नाइट राइडर्स का चौंकाने वाला फैसला! श्रेयस अय्यर नहीं बल्कि इन 'पंच रत्न' को रिटेन करने की तैयारी में फ्रेंचाइजी- रिपोर्ट
newsArray.description: IPL 2025 Retentions, Kolkata Knight Riders: कोलकाता नाइड राइडर्स वेस्टइंडीज के आंद्रे रसेल और सुनील नरेन की जोड़ी के साथ-साथ मध्यक्रम के बल्लेबाज रिंकू सिंह, कलाई के स्पिनर वरुण चक्रवर्ती और अनकैप्ड तेज गेंदबाजी ऑलराउंडर हर्षित राणा को रिटेन कर सकती है.
